title: High Ping Patch 7.8
body:
I have been having high ping over the past month. I use to get around low 60 now it is high ~87. I was hoping the issue would go away on its own but it has not. I do work in the IT field so I have tried troubleshooting my end and things seem fine.

I have tried 3 different computers. 1 wired through router, 1 wired to buildings router, 1 wireless to my router. All 3 have roughly the same ping ~87

I have ran an MTR test and I see 3 possible issues and one of them looks to be a hop from 104.160.138.35 - 104.160.131.1. I am seeing ~20 ms jump at this hop which seems odd. 

MTR Log:
|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

|                                      WinMTR statistics                                   |

|                       Host              -   %  | Sent | Recv | Best | Avrg | Wrst | Last |

|------------------------------------------------|------|------|------|------|------|------|

|                           RT-AC88U-9EC8 -    0 |  928 |  928 |    0 |    0 |    2 |    0 |

|          ics152-225.icsincorporated.com -    0 |  928 |  928 |    0 |    0 |    1 |    0 |

|                             10.243.20.1 -    0 |  928 |  928 |    0 |    0 |    3 |    0 |

|                           10.136.243.21 -    0 |  928 |  928 |    2 |    7 |  360 |    2 |

|    ins-db1-et-11-4-3011.desm.netins.net -    0 |  928 |  928 |    4 |    4 |   15 |    4 |

|            ins-kc2-po20.kmrr.netins.net -    0 |  928 |  928 |    5 |    6 |   11 |    6 |

|               10ge7-3.core1.oma1.he.net -    0 |  928 |  928 |   30 |   32 |   43 |   30 |

|              10ge3-11.core1.den1.he.net -    0 |  928 |  928 |   21 |   26 |   75 |   22 |

|                   No response from host -  100 |  186 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |    0 |

|                          104.160.138.35 -    1 |  920 |  918 |   57 |   57 |   82 |   57 |

|          ae34-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net -    1 |  924 |  923 |   77 |   77 |   93 |   91 |

|                           104.160.131.1 -    1 |  924 |  923 |   76 |   76 |   87 |   76 |

|________________________________________________|______|______|______|______|______|______|

replies.body: Have the sam problem the last 2 days. My ping was always 38-45. Now it's 90-120. Don't know what to do. Riot help!!!
Smh I used to have it lower than 80 like 60s or 70s and doesnt change, well now its 400-1100
well i have no choice now just to uninstall the game cos i cant play this game too much laggs and fps drop BB League Of legends

Same, I have been unable to play as much. Iv been waiting tell after the whole neighborhood is calm, and still having a high ping. Please fix RIOT servers. I know my internet is not bad. I also know my laptop is not bad.
Same problem. Game is unplayable, I fluctuate from 80-250 ping, check my actual ping and i'm at 62. Been happening for about 2 weeks now.

Based off your routing here, it looks like your ping starts to act up early on, and is at a pretty high ping before ever reaching riot direct.  I recommend reaching out to your ISP and sharing your log so they can investigate those hops.  Specifically, 10.136.243.21 is the most screwed.  Hopefully, they'll be able to check it out and fix it up.  

In the meantime, you could try changing how you're routing by configuring your DNS (with steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide).  Hope that helps!
